ratama aadaraya karana, lowama garu karana abhitha senpathi mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumange pradhanathwayen yaldewiya yapanaya bala gaman arambaana pethihasika mohothata ekwimata dahas sankhyatha janakayak ekrok wi sitiyaha.dakunen uthurata samaye saha sahajiwanaye paniwidaya ragena yaldewiya yapanaya bala yana gamana aarambha karannata paleyi dumriya sthanaya bala eeye udasana pamina sitiye abhitha senadhinayaka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha paminena thuruya.udasana 10. 03ta pamana dumriya sthanaya wetha pamini janadhipathithuma pethihasika gamane mangala tikatpatha miladi ganimen anathuruwa wisihathara wasaraka khedaniya athithaya ithihasaya pothe pitu atharata ekkaramin yaldewiya yalith lasi gamanin gaman aarambha kalaya.kiyana de karana- karana de kiyana nayakayaku washayen thrasthawadaya apa mathru bhumiyen athu ga dama aasiyawe aashcharya kara rata ragena yamata ura dena janadhipathithuma dakagannata athiwishala janakayak paleyi dumriya pola wetha pamina sitiyaha.janathawage prithi ghosha saha daru dariyange kelikawata sina mada yaldewiya siya purudu gamanehi yedune wasara 24k gewunath uthurath dakunath ya kirima thamata asiru nowana bawa kiyapamini.wasara gananawak thisse dakune ha uthure nada hithamithuran wenuwen pethihasika gamanaka yedunu yaldewiyage dewani gamane asiriya narambaannata uthure janathawa dumriya manga depasa raskamin bala sitinu dakinnata labini.wasara 24kin kanata nasunu, asehi nogatunu yaldewiye sundara gamana thaman atha randi kamara saha jangama durakathanawala satahan kara gannata uthure janathawa amathaka nokalaha.

mama hithanna pohottuwe apekshakaya gana ehema ridmayak thibenawa kiyala.ee ayage pradhanama charithaya thamayi gotabhaya.purawasikama gana pudgalikawa gotabhayata gataluwak thibenawa.eyata purawasibhawaya naha kiyala setipiket eka idiripath karanna puluwan nam pahadiliwa eyata illanna puluwan.ee nisama thamayi mahindage nama aාyeth enne.mahindata aාyeth illanna puluwan kiyala welgama athulu pirisakage mathayak thibenawa.mama danna nithiya anuwanam itha pahadiliyi eyata tharanga karanna baha.ehema thiyeddi ji.el.piris eyata illanna puluwan kiyala idiripath karana eka matath pudumayi.

engalanthayenam, nomile waidya pahasukam, siyaluma sathkam, beheth, baswala saha dumriye yanna pahasukam sapayanawa.mehe henchayiyalata witharak 60 n passe wadakaranna kabinat anumathiya dila aanduwe yana wahanath denawa.anith aya wyawasayakayan karanawa kiyala panshan ekatath thattu karayi.
